wxSkinSlider Class Reference

Implements a simple Slider control. When being dragged it emits a wxEVT_COMMAND_SLIDER_UPDATED. Currently on horizontal. More...

Detailed Description

Implements a simple Slider control. When being dragged it emits a wxEVT_COMMAND_SLIDER_UPDATED. Currently on horizontal.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void wxSkinSlider::DrawCustom ( wxDC &  dc  )  [virtual]

Overwrite this method in derived classses.

This method will be called after the standard drawing action has been completed. This allows to do some non-standard drawing in dervied controls.

Implements wxSkinWindow.
